body:
I was wondering If it is illegal. I've been using 'Toggle Sprint' Not 'Better sprint' for the past 2 years and it really dosen't do anything that people do already.

Example:

Toggle sprint makes it easier to walk or in a sense run in minecraft.

By pressing a button, For example mine is 'F' making your sprint toggled to where all you have to do is just hold down 'W' or whatever your walk foward button is, Instead of holding LControl and W.

Toggle sprint also comes w/ Toggle Sneak meaning instead of holding shift and while mining to a monument or something you unshift to message someone / reply to somone, your able to type in chat while still having your Shift toggled.

IMO: It does not really set an advantage over other players because all it really does is help us play minecraft alot easier with the Toggle keys.

It does not have anything to do with any Hacked client or Anything like that.

Note: I have not been in the community for the last 5 months so if it is legal forgive me, But it should be legal due to it not having anything to link with a client or any advantage over other players.
body_tagged:

Toggle sprint also comes w/ Toggle Sneak meaning instead of holding shift and while mining to a monument or something you unshift to message someone / reply to somone, your able to type in chat while still having your Shift toggled.

IMO: It does not really set an advantage over other players because all it really does is help us play minecraft alot easier with the Toggle keys.

Note: I have not been in the community for the last 5 months so if it is legal forgive me, But it should be legal due to it not having anything to link with a client or any advantage over other players.
title: Toggle Sprint illegal?

replies.body: I personally think this may need rewording, because I'm pretty sure that the rule was regarding speed hacks, not toggling sprint. I don't really see how toggling sprint will change anything PvP wise, and I'll get that rule changed. As of now, I'll go on ahead and say it's fine to use, as long as there's no toggling crouch.

replies.body: In my opinion it shouldn't be allowed because it gives you an advantage over other players.Every player should have the same chances to win the game. The already added "sprintkey" can be used by everyone. The toggle Sprint/better Sprint mod has to be downloaded to use it ingame. That means people who don't have the mod installed have a disadvantage.

replies.body:
If you hold your sprint button constantly during pvp you will be sprinting between each hit that you do. On my old laptop my sprint key was caps lock, the fact that this button is already toggled (like number lock etc.) meant that I could basically have constant sprint even without holding the sprint key down. So if I touched a block that would cancel my sprint I would carry on sprinting without having to press the sprint key again. 

However i I think this was a glitch or something because I can't get it to work on my new PC. Is there a way of doing it and are toggle sprint mods legal??
replies.body_tagged:
If you hold your sprint button constantly during pvp you will be sprinting between each hit that you do. On my old laptop my sprint key was caps lock, the fact that this button is already toggled (like number lock etc.) meant that I could basically have constant sprint even without holding the sprint key down. So if I touched a block that would cancel my sprint I would carry on sprinting without having to press the sprint key again. 

However i I think this was a glitch or something because I can't get it to work on my new PC. Is there a way of doing it and are toggle sprint mods legal??
